alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 7:07PM EST until February 05 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Yellow River near Conyers below Milstead affecting Newton and Rockdale Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River near Conyers below Milstead. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands, fields and pasture along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Gees Mill Road in Rockdale County. Portions of Sockwell Road by the river in Newton County will be around two feet under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:47 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 11.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
